Container.Name: kcc-cloud
Container.Overview: KCC Cloud transforms your manga, comics, and documents into e-reader optimized formats (EPUB, MOBI, PDF, KFX, CBZ) with a modern, responsive web interface. Built for self-hosting with Docker, it provides multi-device access, real-time job monitoring, and parallel processing capabilities.
